    • Highlights

    • Experience the tranquil backwaters of Alleppey with a traditional houseboat cruise.
    • Explore the lush tea gardens, scenic waterfalls, and misty hills of Munnar.
    • Visit Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary in Thekkady and enjoy a boat ride to view wildlife.
    • Stroll through the historical streets of Cochin, visiting landmarks like Fort Kochi and Mattancherry Palace.
    • Relax on the serene beaches of Kerala and indulge in authentic Kerala cuisine.

    Kerala Delight - 5 Nights / 6 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Kochin

    • Arrive in Kochin and transfer to your hotel.
    • Explore Fort Kochi, Mattancherry Palace, and the famous Chinese fishing nets.
    • Enjoy a Kathakali dance performance in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cochin.

    Day 2: Cochin to Munnar

    • After breakfast, drive to Munnar, a picturesque hill station known for its tea gardens.
    • En route, visit Cheeyappara and Valara waterfalls.
    • Arrive in Munnar, check in, and relax for the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 3: Munnar Sightseeing

    • Visit popular attractions like Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty Dam, and Kundala Lake.
    • Explore tea plantations and enjoy a tea-tasting experience.
    • Visit the Tea Museum to learn about tea processing.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 4: Munnar to Thekkady

    • After breakfast, drive to Thekkady, known for its wildlife sanctuary.
    • Check in to the hotel and enjoy a guided boat ride in Periyar Lake.
    • Spot wildlife such as elephants, deer, and exotic birds.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Thekkady.

    Day 5: Thekkady to Alleppey

    • Drive to Alleppey, famous for its backwaters and houseboat experiences.
    • Board a traditional houseboat for a serene cruise along the backwaters.
    • Relax and enjoy the lush scenery, coconut groves, and local village life.
    • Overnight stay on a houseboat in Alleppey.

    Day 6: Departure from Alleppey

    • After breakfast, disembark from the houseboat.
    • Transfer to Cochin for your departure.
    • End of the Kerala Delight tour.
